text: Derry is an unincorporated community in Natchitoches Parish, Louisiana, United States. It is on Louisiana Highway 1. It is the closest town to Magnolia Plantation, a National Historic Landmark. There is an abandoned school next to the St. Matthew Baptist Church off Louisiana Highway 119 near Derry. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Natchitoches Parish, Louisiana
title: Derry, Louisiana
